Texts.Chs: 我一直在等从^green;厄尔吉斯矿场^reset;运来的20块^orange;厄尔吉斯水晶^reset;。他们迟到了两个星期，没有这些水晶前哨站就有麻烦了！矿场的坐标我已经发到你飞船上的^green;S.A.I.L^reset;里面了。你能^green;就我们于危难之中^reset;吗？
Texts.Eng: I've been awaitin' a shipment of ^orange;20 Erchius Crystals^reset; from the ^green;Erchius Mining Facility^reset;. They're two weeks late and without these crystals the outpost is in trouble! I've sent the location coordinates to ^green;yer ship's SAIL^reset;. Can you ^green;please help us^reset;?

Texts.Chs: 我的朋友...你的^orange;FTL引擎^red;已经完全损坏了^reset;！我可修不好这个，你只能自己用你的厄尔吉斯水晶^green;重新做一台^reset;。请在^orange;加工台^reset;找到并制作它。
Texts.Eng: My friend...your ^orange;FTL drive ^red;is destroyed^reset;! I can't fix this! You'll have to ^green;build it on your own^reset;. Use your Erchius crystals for it. Check a ^orange;Machining Table^reset; for it.

Texts.Chs: 好极了！ 这些可以让我们坚持一段时间。 如果你还没有机甲,，你应该前往在我们脚底下的^green;维修区的机械库^reset;去和^green;阿卡基博士^reset;交谈。
Texts.Eng: Perfect! These'll keep us going fer quite a while. If you haven't already, you should head down to ^green;the maintenance area^reset; below us and talk to ^green;Dr.Akaggy^reset; in the ^green;Mech Hangar^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 把^orange;厄尔吉斯晶体^green;带到^orange;前哨站^white;的^orange;皮特船长^reset;那里
Texts.Eng: ^green;Bring^reset; the ^orange;Erchius Crystals^reset; to ^orange;Penguin Pete^reset; at the ^orange;Outpost^reset;
